get.description: A summary of the user's rewards.

devices.description:
Devices is a list of the user's devices, together with some information about their
connectivity.

points.description: Points is the user's total number of points, across all devices and issuance weeks.

thisWeek.description: ThisWeek describes the current issuance week.

connectedThisWeek.description:
ConnectedThisWeek is true if we've seen activity from the device during the current issuance
week.

connectionStreak.description:
ConnectionStreak is what we consider the streak of the device to be. This may not literally
be the number of consecutive connected weeks, because the user may disconnect for a week
without penalty, or have the connection streak reduced after three weeks of inactivity.

disconnectionStreak.description:
DisconnectionStreak is the number of consecutive issuance weeks that the device has been
disconnected. This number resets to 0 as soon as a device earns rewards for a certain week.

id.description: ID is the user device ID used across all services.

level.description: Level is the level 1-4 of the device. This is fully determined by ConnectionStreak.

points.description: Points is the total number of points that the device has earned across all weeks.

end.description: End is the timestamp of the start of the next issuance week.

start.description: Start is the timestamp of the start of the issuance week.
